page.title: 08Halls Farm (contd.)
page.content: Grain merchants buy the wheat off them and marisotter, a high graded barley is one of them.Hay making is also done in summer, whilst in the winter they plough the fields ready for the next crop to be grown in the summer.This is also when the grain merchants come to buy the produce.They do some maintanence(if needed)on the farm machenery.Instead of using the old method of changing around all your fields they spread chemicals to get rid of the insects that are a threat to the crop. The farmer breeds Bull Sheredins for beef,to get them he crosses HereGods with Fesians.The Heregods are small but fat cows are good for meat and the Fresians are good for milk.So if you combine them you get a good allround cow.The market used to want the fat of a cow on the head but now
